title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisite: NoneTypes of Information and need for information security. Authentication Applications â Kerberos, X.509 authentication service. E-mail Security â S/MIME, spam filtering. IP Security â overview, architecture; authentication header and security payload encapsulation. Web Security. Intrusion detection systems â Expert systems, neural network, data mining and game theoretic approaches. Misuse detection and anomaly detection. Denial of service, User to root and remote to local attacks. Virus and other malicious software. Firewalls. Secure multi-party computation applications. Security in wireless networks.
